original_text: All people have done wrong things. Nobody can be good and great, as God wanted them to be. All people have done wrong things. Nobody can be good and great, as God wanted them to be. korean_text: 모든 사람이 죄를 범하였으매 하나님의 영광에 이르지 못하더니

sentences.original_text: All people have done wrong things.
Nobody can be good and great,
as God wanted them to be.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 원하신 대로 될 수 없습니다.
